sequence:
The Melancholy of a Princess Chevalier

<size=45>Chapter 5 - Listen to Your Heart</size>

scripts.say: I asked Le Triomphant what was bothering her while we walked around port.
Commander, did you know that I'm the youngest sister of the Le Fantasque class?
Yes, as you might surmise, I have several other older sisters...
Before that war, we were all very close. I thought that things would be able to stay like that forever.
Even when war broke out, I had nothing to fear as long as my sisters were with me...
There were a lot of complicated circumstances; everyone started to go their separate ways...

options.content: You'll be able to overcome your differences one day.

scripts.say: Even though we're all aiming for the same goal, why did we end up having to fight each other...?
Since coming here, I've managed to regain some of my hope thanks to you, Commander.
Somewhere deep in my heart, this has always been bothering me...
Even if we're all in the same fleet, would it really be so easy for things to return to how they used to be...?
Le Triomphant's expression was full of sorrow.
That's why when I saw Erebus and Terror, Lexington and Saratoga, I felt a little jealous...
I hope that one day, I'll be able to return to those days where I can get along with my sisters again...
But as things are right now, even if I was to meet them, I don't know what I should do...
Commander, can you tell me what I'm supposed to do?
Her sorrowful voice quivered with helplessness.
